system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision fixed. Implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2009-06-10 21:44:06 -0700 (Wed, 10 Jun 2009) $" revision: "$Revision: 79201 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xmlEV_FIXED_I
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_widget_list_i.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Element change
f_extend_with_position_and_size../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_extend_with_position_and_sizeextend_with_position_and_size (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Add a_widget to Current with a position of a_x, a_y' and a dimension of a_width and a_height. require a_widget_not_void: a_widget /= Void a_widget_parent_void: a_widget.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent = Void a_width_not_smaller_than_minimum_width: a_width >= a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width a_height_not_smaller_than_minimum_height: a_height >= a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_extendextend (a_widget) ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_positionset_item_position (a_widget, a_x, a_y) ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_sizeset_item_size (a_widget, a_width, a_height) ensure has_a_widget: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (a_widget) parent_is_current: a_widget.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent = ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface count_increased: ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_countcount = old ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 an_item_x_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_x_positionx_position = a_x an_item_y_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_y_positiony_position = a_y an_item_width_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth = a_width an_item_height_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight = a_height end
f_set_item_position_and_size../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_position_and_sizeset_item_position_and_size (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; a_x, a_y, a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign a_widget with a position of a_x and a_y', and a dimension of a_width and a_height. require a_widget_not_void: a_widget /= Void a_width_not_smaller_than_minimum_width: a_width >= a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width a_height_not_smaller_than_minimum_height: a_height >= a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height do ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_positionset_item_position (a_widget, a_x, a_y) ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_sizeset_item_size (a_widget, a_width, a_height) ensure an_item_x_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_x_positionx_position = a_x an_item_y_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_y_positiony_position = a_y an_item_width_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth = a_width an_item_height_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight = a_height end
f_set_item_x_position../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_x_positionset_item_x_position (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; an_x: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set a_widget.x_position to an_x. require has_a_widget: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (a_widget) do ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_positionset_item_position (a_widget, an_x, a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_y_positiony_position) ensure a_widget_x_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_x_positionx_position = an_x end
f_set_item_y_position../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_y_positionset_item_y_position (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; a_y: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set a_widget.y_position to a_y. require has_a_widget: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (a_widget) do ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_positionset_item_position (a_widget, a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_x_positionx_position, a_y) ensure a_widget_y_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_y_positiony_position = a_y end
f_set_item_position../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_positionset_item_position (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; an_x, a_y: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set a_widget.x_position to an_x. -- Set a_widget.y_position to a_y. require has_a_widget: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (a_widget) deferred ensure a_widget_x_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_x_positionx_position = an_x a_widget_y_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_y_positiony_position = a_y end
f_set_item_width../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_widthset_item_width (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; a_width: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set a_widget.width to a_width. require has_a_widget: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (a_widget) a_width_not_smaller_than_minimum_width: a_width >= a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width do ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_sizeset_item_size (a_widget, a_width, a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight) end
f_set_item_height../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_heightset_item_height (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set a_widget.height to a_height. require has_a_widget: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (a_widget) a_height_not_smaller_than_minimum_height: a_height >= a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height do ../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_sizeset_item_size (a_widget, a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth, a_height) end
f_set_item_size../implementation_interface/ev_fixed_i.xml#f_set_item_sizeset_item_size (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET; a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set a_widget.width to a_width. -- Set a_widget.height to a_height. require has_a_widget: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (a_widget) a_width_not_smaller_than_minimum_width: a_width >= a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_widthminimum_width a_height_not_smaller_than_minimum_height: a_height >= a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height deferred end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
